name: DCH Presenting Complaint Emergency Care
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK 'Emergency care presenting complaints or issues simple reference set' with refset ID 991401000000107, that describes health problem or issue experienced by the patient resulting in their attendance.
